title: Gordon Brown | The Office of the UN Special Envoy for Global Education

quotes: He served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2007 to 2010
Previously, he served as Chancellor of the Exchequer from 1997 to 2007
In April 2009, he hosted the G20 Summit in London

quotes: He served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2007 to 2010 and is widely credited with preventing a second Great Depression through his stewardship of the 2009 London G20 summit

organizations.name: Labour
quotes: During ten years at the Treasury, Gordon masterminded many of Labour’s proudest achievements

organizations.name: High Level Panel on Global Education
quotes: He is a passionate advocate for global action to ensure education for all and co-chairs a High Level Panel on Global Education with Graça Machel
